text: tutên an rângkachak, sumdâr, lungmantamngei, le lungintêrngei; an rosompuon neinunngei, puonsendukngei, puoninnâlngei, le puonseninlârngei; thing mirimhoi jât dadangngei le sâiha leh an sin ngei murdi le thing manluttak, sumdâr le thîr le sâilungvâra an sin ngei;18:12-13: Ezek 27:12,13,22
